price: 13. De dag waarop zij met kracht naar het vuur worden geduwd.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
